TunableList.name: traps
TunableList.description: A mapping of trap objects to the interactions that can be used in the pool potential of 'trigger' interaction. A trap object will be chosen at random from this mapping and placed at each placeholder trap in this room. Once all trap objects have been chosen and placed for a room, all of the mapped interactions will be collected and one random interaction will be chosen as the 'trigger' interaction.

TunableList.name: Potential Trigger Interactions
TunableList.description: A set of interactions that, if successfully completed on the chosen trap object, will trigger the loot for the gate in this room.

Tunable.description: One of the potential trigger interactions. This interaction also needs to be tuned on the object chosen for this trap.
